cardData.name: Bae Suzy
cardData.description: A South Korean actress and singer, who rose to fame as a member of the girl group Miss A. She has starred in several popular Korean dramas and films, and is considered one of the most beautiful and talented actresses in South Korea.

cardData.name: Im Yoona-ah
cardData.description: A South Korean singer, actress, and member of the girl group Girls' Generation. She has acted in numerous popular dramas and films, and is known for her beauty and talent.

cardData.name: Kim So-Hee
cardData.description: A South Korean actress and singer, who is a member of the girl group ELRIS. She has acted in various popular dramas and films, and is known for her stunning visuals and versatile acting skills.
